Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 95th/Dan Ryan
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near 95th/Dan Ryan due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near 95th/Dan Ryan due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#24 Wentworth
#29 State
#34 South Michigan
#95 95th
#100 Jeffrey Manor Express
#103 West 103rd
#106 East 103rd
Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
